name: creative-team
description: Creative content production plugin with 17 specialized agents organized in strategic workflow layers. Strategy Layer: X0 content analyst, X1 advertising strategist, X2 copywriter, X3 design deconstructor, X4 brand strategist; Design & Marketing Layer: X5 Canvas layout specialist, X6 content marketing strategist, X7 React frontend designer; AIGC Core Cluster (集中相邻): X8 animated GIF designer, X9 algorithmic artist, X10 photorealistic image specialist, X11 AI video generator, X12 AI music composer, X13 AI voice synthesizer; Video Processing Group: X14 social media video editor, X15 professional video editor, X16 timestamp specialist; plus XX creative team leader for orchestration.
